record.titleName: Metropolitan Housing and Planning Bus Tour
record.description: Municipal Housing Court, Judge Harten. [Metropolitan Housing and Planning] Council court observers carried on this watch-dog activity for many years and got some stunning results pin-pointing slum landlords. Took record of disposition of each case and followed up on some bad cases.
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
